abstract: 'This place was special, long before we discovered it'.
description: Kaye Munroe remembers the day the devastating Gippsland bushfires came to her doorstep. The 'travelling fingers' of the bushfire threatened not only her home but the beauty of the area she loved. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
